Question: On Copenhagen Street, Islington is the ____l Children's Library.
Hints: This attack was diagnosed as possibly "epileptiform" and this personl himself later wrote of his "seizures" in the same diary.
This paper, known as the "cut pages in diary document", was compiled by various members of this personl's family after his death.
When issued it also included a copy of this personl's pamphletted lecture, Eight or Nine Wise Words About Letter-Writing.
